{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#生田辉##生田辉2021生诞祭#
还记得去年的生日祝福语吗？
从初印象中舞台挨拶最右边的短发美少女，到帅气又温柔的辉君，再到今天的你……
过去的一年里，你的声优、演员、歌手等事业都获得了不斐的成绩，也给我们展示了颇多惊艳的新形象——
如果去年的你是“帅气又温柔的辉君”，那么，对，今年的你就是“帅气、温柔、坚毅又可靠的‘辉女子’”！
所以，充满活力，坚持走下去吧！带领我们一起领略各种各样的风景吧！","id":132196030,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1536,"img_size":271.6396484375,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/3126c8b6d10c48dc55a972024b600025e90f614f.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2048},{"img_height":1536,"img_size":339.3125,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/03d50af582e36dc606ff418d24b15a791ba330fb.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2048},{"img_height":1536,"img_size":483.48828125,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/0f392324aa03730becf0d79eb0546266542a337c.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2048},{"img_height":768,"img_size":89.708984375,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/861ee3f2cc9573d000b32cb4602a3febf5923700.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1024},{"img_height":1752,"img_size":177.7490234375,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/5a2942e3cec63e6971efaa9eb79ff3aefdc1300d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1247},{"img_height":1536,"img_size":530.564453125,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/d5b87cb1a0482601c7aecf06f69115a6c487d408.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2048},{"img_height":1108,"img_size":263.078125,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/b8bbe82b799449f4373f637369dd23c235c8fc6d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1478},{"img_height":2048,"img_size":609.0419921875,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/fcdf50b2aa778cbb625a42171a1a2940854ef9ca.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1512},{"img_height":1536,"img_size":718.189453125,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/e8407702ebfe283e2d84dc3a07268a7cf6e74328.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2048}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":47,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1619793072},"user":{"head_url":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
